nodes.text: A zoo was located in Sarini Island, on the planet Chandrila. It featured pangorins, caw-crabs and uralangs. In 5 ABY, Brentin, Temmin, and Norra Wexley visited the zoo. During their visit, they watched the pangorins in their grottoes, caw-crabs splashing around their enclosures, and the uralangs, which Brentin laughed at.
Sarini Island zoo was first mentioned in Aftermath: Life Debt, a novel by Chuck Wendig, which was released on July 12, 2016.
